My wife told me to put ketchup on the shopping list. Now I can't read anything on it.
I got fired from the transmission factory, turns out I didn't put on enough shifts.
I love telling Dad jokes. Sometimes he laughs.
I can't take my dog to the pond anymore because the ducks keep attacking him. That's what I get for buying a pure bread dog.
I’m addicted to brake fluid, but it’s OK because I can stop at any time.
A photon checks into a hotel. The front desk asks if it has any luggage. It replies: no, I’m traveling light
The other day, my wife asked me to pass her lipstick but I accidentally passed her a glue stick. She still isn't talking to me.
